detectors.description:
owned.transferOwnership(address) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2a6e010c4fce2211d1f4d47461b9831a51d9e451_CopyrightToken.sol#15-17) should emit an event for: 
	- owner = newOwner (../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2a6e010c4fce2211d1f4d47461b9831a51d9e451_CopyrightToken.sol#16)

owned.transferOwnership(address).newOwner (../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2a6e010c4fce2211d1f4d47461b9831a51d9e451_CopyrightToken.sol#15) lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = newOwner (../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2a6e010c4fce2211d1f4d47461b9831a51d9e451_CopyrightToken.sol#16)
solc-0.4.16 is not recommended for deployment
detectors.markdown: solc-0.4.16 is not recommended for deployment
